channel.title: Vibecast: Morning Vibe
channel.description: A short daily podcast with weather, inspiring stories, and a reason to get excited about today.
channel.itunes:author: Dominic
channel.itunes:summary: A short daily podcast with weather, inspiring stories, and a reason to get excited about today.

item.title: Morning Vibe — December 20, 2025
item.description:
Good news to fuel your day for December 20, 2025.
Duration: ~5 minutes
IN THIS EPISODE:
1. Stunning Crocheted Christmas Tree Helped Knit Together a Community of Extraordinary Women – LOOK Source: Good News Network 2. Wind-Sculpted Landscapes: Investigating the Martian Megaripple ‘Hazyview’ Source: NASA Breaking News 3. NASA Johnson’s 2025 Milestones Source: NASA Breaking News 4. NASA's Perseverance Mars rover could break the record for miles driven on another planet Source: Space.com 5. Top 10 Friday Five Posts of 2025 Source: Design Milk 6. What went right this week: the good news that matters Source: Positive News
REFERENCES:
1. Stunning Crocheted Christmas Tree Helped Knit Together a Community of Extraordinary Women – LOOK https://www.goodnewsnetwork.org/stunning-crocheted-christmas-tree-helped-knit-together-a-community-of-extraordinary-women-look/
2. Wind-Sculpted Landscapes: Investigating the Martian Megaripple ‘Hazyview’ https://science.nasa.gov/blog/wind-sculpted-landscapes-investigating-the-martian-megaripple-hazyview/
3. NASA Johnson’s 2025 Milestones https://www.nasa.gov/centers-and-facilities/johnson/nasa-johnsons-2025-milestones/
4. NASA's Perseverance Mars rover could break the record for miles driven on another planet https://www.space.com/space-exploration/mars-rovers/nasas-perseverance-mars-rover-could-break-the-record-for-miles-driven-on-another-planet
5. Top 10 Friday Five Posts of 2025 https://design-milk.com/top-10-friday-five-posts-of-2025/
6. What went right this week: the good news that matters https://www.positive.news/society/good-news-stories-from-week-51-of-2025/

item.title: Morning Vibe — December 19, 2025
item.description:
Good news to fuel your day for December 19, 2025.
Duration: ~5 minutes
IN THIS EPISODE:
1. Good News in History, December 18 Source: Good News Network 2. NASA’s Hubble Sees Asteroids Colliding at Nearby Star for First Time Source: NASA Breaking News 3. NASA, Boeing Test How to Improve Performance of Longer, Narrower Aircraft Wings Source: NASA Breaking News 4. Sam Venis documents infrastructure at "political experiment" Próspera in Honduras Source: Dezeen 5. Modular housing complex for expanding families among projects from University of Southern California Source: Dezeen 6. Ctrl+Alt+Defy, the white-hat hacker rewriting the cybersecurity rulebook Source: Positive News
REFERENCES:
1. Good News in History, December 18 https://www.goodnewsnetwork.org/events061218/
2. NASA’s Hubble Sees Asteroids Colliding at Nearby Star for First Time https://science.nasa.gov/missions/hubble/nasas-hubble-sees-asteroids-colliding-at-nearby-star-for-first-time/
3. NASA, Boeing Test How to Improve Performance of Longer, Narrower Aircraft Wings https://www.nasa.gov/aeronautics/nasa-boeing-test-aircraft-wings/
4. Sam Venis documents infrastructure at "political experiment" Próspera in Honduras https://www.dezeen.com/2025/12/18/infrastructure-prospera-honduras-sam-venis/
5. Modular housing complex for expanding families among projects from University of Southern California https://www.dezeen.com/2025/12/18/modular-housing-structure-university-of-southern-california-schoolshows/
6. Ctrl+Alt+Defy, the white-hat hacker rewriting the cybersecurity rulebook https://www.positive.news/science/technology/ctrlaltdefy-the-white-hat-hacker-rewriting-the-cybersecurity-rulebook/

item.title: Morning Vibe — December 18, 2025
item.description:
Good news to fuel your day for December 18, 2025.
Duration: ~5 minutes
IN THIS EPISODE:
1. ‘Trashed Panda’ Story Raises $180,000 for Animal Shelter That Discovered it Drunk in the Bathroom Source: Good News Network 2. Good News in History, December 17 Source: Good News Network 3. NASA Langley Research Center: 2025 Year in Review Source: NASA Breaking News 4. Camera on NASA Mars probe snaps its 100,000th photo of the Red Planet Source: Space.com 5. SpaceX launches Starlink missions in dual-coast spaceflight doubleheader (videos) Source: Space.com 6. Creative community centre among architecture projects from Monash University Source: Dezeen

item.title: Morning Vibe — December 17, 2025
item.description:
Good news to fuel your day for December 17, 2025.
Duration: ~5 minutes
IN THIS EPISODE:
1. NASA Launches Research Program for Students to Explore Big Ideas Source: NASA Breaking News 2. Through Astronaut Eyes: 25 Years of Life in Orbit Source: NASA Breaking News 3. NASA, Partners Share First Data From New US-European Sea Satellite Source: NASA JPL News 4. Nothing fans contribute to retro-tinged Phone (3a) Community Edition Source: Dezeen 5. Nothing’s New Phone (3a) Was Designed by Its Future Users Source: Design Milk 6. A season of solidarity: eight projects empowering people this Christmas Source: Positive News

item.title: Morning Vibe — December 16, 2025
item.description:
Good news to fuel your day for December 16, 2025.
Duration: ~5 minutes
IN THIS EPISODE:
1. Ten years Source: OpenAI News 2. Strengthening cyber resilience as AI capabilities advance Source: OpenAI News 3. Anti-Defamation League says anger at Israel is now the driving force behind antisemitism in the U.S. Source: NY1 Politics 4. ‘I found my people’: Frank Turner on saving Britain’s grassroots music venues Source: Positive News 5. How to avoid plastic tat killing the Christmas buzz Source: Positive News 6. CNN Hero of the Year Turns Vacant Lots on Chicago’s South Side into Flower Farms Source: Good News Network

item.description:

BNY builds “AI for everyone, everywhere” with OpenAI Source: OpenAI News 5. How We Used Codex to Ship Sora for Android in 28 Days Source: OpenAI News 6. The AI-Bubble – Slow hiss or big bang? item.title: Morning Sunshine — December 14, 2025
item.description:
Your daily dose of good news and good vibes for December 14, 2025.
Duration: ~3 minutes
IN THIS EPISODE:
1. Good News in History, December 14 Source: Good News Network 2. Photographer Captures Incredible Luminous Event Over His Italian Town–For the Second Time (LOOK) Source: Good News Network 3. What went right this week: the good news that matters Source: Positive News 4. Abandoned oil refineries are becoming unlikely havens for wildlife Source: Positive News 5. NASA Astronaut Jonny Kim to Discuss Eight-Month Space Station Mission Source: NASA 6. NASA’s Webb, Curiosity Named in TIME’s Best Inventions Hall of Fame Source: NASA
